World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 3 月 18 日星期一 20:19:34 GMT 120
EU Foreign Ministers approved sanctions in relation to Navalny's deathForeign Ministers of the European Union member states on Monday approved sanctions against individuals and institutions in relation to the death of Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny, Spanish Foreign Minister Jose Manuel Albares told reporters on Monday after meeting with his EU counterparts. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 17:55:31 GMT TW7CGCI7VVJADHN4PHIN5KCLVI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-foreign-ministers-approved-sanctions-relationship-navalnys-death-2024-03-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Looming Rafah incursion would 'break' Gaza aid distribution, UN saysThe United Nations humanitarian coordinator said on Monday an Israeli assault on Rafah would leave Gaza aid distribution "broken" as the organisation would be unable to prepare enough supplies for the already displaced people fleeing the area. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 17:45:41 GMT ZOV6WBXFCJN6NOUDEDCK5QBA2I https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/looming-rafah-incursion-could-break-gaza-aid-distribution-un-says-2024-03-18/Reuters世界中东地区
US, Japan urge nations not to deploy nuclear weapons in orbitThe United States and Japan on Monday proposed a U.N. Security Council resolution stressing that nations should comply with a treaty that bars putting nuclear weapons in space, a message that appeared aimed at Russia. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 17:38:50 GMT YPVRLFMSGVKADOPWV4XSAK452E https://www.reuters.com/world/us-japan-urges-nations-not-to-deploy-nuclear-weapons-orbit-2024-03-18/Reuters世界
US says seeking information on reports of detained Al Jazeera reporter in GazaThe United States is aware of reports that an Al Jazeera journalist was detained by Israeli Defense Forces, State Department deputy spokesperson Vedant Patel told a news briefing on Monday, adding that Washington has sought information from Israel on the incident. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 17:33:08 GMT F54Q7AVSBFIC3KDQPRJR5I43IU https://www.reuters.com/world/us-says-seeking-information-reports-detained-al-jazeera-reporter-in-gaza-2024-03-18/Reuters世界
Putin greets Moscow rally after election winA day after securing a new six-year term, Russian President Vladimir Putin appeared briefly at an open-air concert on Red Square on Monday to mark the 10th anniversary of Russia's annexation of Crimea from Ukraine. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 17:18:05 GMT OS3NOOIQWJKGHAC5ASQEYHJTGA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/putin-greets-moscow-rally-after-election-win-2024-03-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Toronto police report surge in hate crimes against Jews, MuslimsThe number of antisemitic and anti-Muslim hate crimes in Canada's largest city of Toronto have risen significantly during the war in Gaza that followed Hamas' deadly Oct. 7 attack inside Israel, Toronto police said on Monday. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 17:03:37 GMT HCPJGQSIDBKXXIRPDCK7OSGCRU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/toronto-police-report-surge-hate-crimes-against-jews-muslims-2024-03-18/Wa Lone, Kyawsoe Oo世界美洲
Cuba summons top US diplomat, accuses US of stoking protestsCuba's foreign ministry said it had summoned the top U.S. diplomat on the island to a meeting following protests on Sunday, accusing the U.S. embassy in Havana of seeking to stoke a broader anti-government uprising and meddling in Cuba's internal affairs. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 16:58:25 GMT T2W3P2HS6VKDNONEESPDPBIVM3Q https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/cuban-government-says-we-stoked- Five-protests-weekend-2024-03-18/Dave Sherwood世界美洲
Egyptians thought Regeni was British spy, Italian court toldEgyptian police detained an Italian student in Cairo because they thought he was a British spy, taking him to a security facility where he was tortured and murdered, an Italian prosecutor told a Rome court on Monday. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 16:45:45 GMT H6XX7UWWG5JCREEICGUUEHGE54 https://www.reuters.com/world/egyptians-thought-regeni-was-british-spy-italian-court-told-2024-03-18/Crispian Balmer世界
Argentina economy set for third straight year-on-year contraction in Q4Argentina's gross domestic product (GDP) is expected to have shrunk 1.5% year-on-year in the final quarter of 2023, the third straight annualized contraction, hit by declines in virtually all sectors of the economy, a Reuters poll found. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 16:30:36 GMT IYI7C2XLAJIF5J5CBYOVFDAMTU阿根廷经济连续第三季度同比收缩-2024-03-18/Hernan Nessi世界美洲
US warned Niger about ties to Russia, Iran before junta revoked accord, Pentagon saysU.S. officials traveled to Niger last week to express concerns about the country's potential development of ties to Russia and Iran before the ruling junta on Saturday revoked an accord governing the roughly 1,000 U.S. military personnel there, the Pentagon said on Monday. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 16:28:28 GMT FHZJPAOSCVPRFO6JRFOSVDDODI https://www.reuters.com/world/us-warned-niger-about-ties-Russia-iran-before-junta-revoked-pentagon-accord-2024-03-18/Phil Stewart世界
Israel asks World Court not to order new measures over Gaza hungerIsrael has asked the International Court of Justice (ICJ) not to issue emergency orders for it to step up humanitarian aid to Gaza to address a looming famine, dismissing South Africa's request to do so as "morally repugnant". Mon, 18 Mar 2024 15:53:31 GMT QUDSGXTOYFLFFMCTQGBQ324X7U https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-asks-world-court-not-order-new-measures-over-gaza-famine-2024-03-18/Reuters世界中东地区
